title: Rockwell with rounded serifs?
content:
Is there a font out there that could be described as [Rockwell](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016090323/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=rockwell) with rounded serifs? We're looking for something like this for a charity project, like Rockwell, but would want to have it a bit softer, and if the serifs had round endings, that would do it. We've tried it by rounding the corners on a few characters, but are wondering what's the closest existing font would be.

Many thanks.

Edit: Ah yes, and it shouldn't be any typewriter font.
author: spirelli

comments.content: Have you considered FF Tisa? It doesn't have anything to do with Rockwell rounded but it is a very nice slab serif face with a soft/friendly feeling...

Ignore the name, and you'll find that URW Typewriter is actually a rounded slab serif in the Rockwell/Serifa/Glypha mode.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/typewriter/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016090323/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/typewriter/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/typewriter/")
Many thanks. We'll go for the URW Typewriter :)
